name: roar-extension
description: Web Extension for ROAR! (Public Feedback Project)

scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run compile && npm run bundle
scripts.build:watch:
npm run build && { npm run compile:watch & 
 npm run bundle:watch & 
 wait 
 }
scripts.lint: { find src -name '*.ts' | xargs tslint --project tsconfig.json --config tslint.json ; } && { find src -name '*.ts' -exec grep 'only: true' {} + | { ! grep '^'; } }
scripts.test: npm run clear && npm run compile && mocha --timeout 20000 --require test_setup.js --require source-map-support/register 'compiled/**/*.test.js'
scripts.test:watch:
npm run clear && npm run compile && { npm run compile:watch &
mocha --timeout 20000 --require test_setup.js --require source-map-support/register 'compiled/**/*.test.js' --watch --watch-extensions js &
wait
}
scripts.zip-source-code-for-firefox: cd .. && find extensions | grep -v 'node_modules' | grep -v '.git' | grep -v 'manifest.json' | grep -v '^extensions/compiled' | grep -v '^extensions/bundled' | grep -v '^extensions/publish' | grep -v '^extensions$' | grep -v '.zip$' | zip -rTg extension-source-code.zip -@ && cd extensions
